statements: SELECT id FROM external_integration
SELECT id, data FROM external_integration WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM external_integration WHERE data->'name' = 'John'
SELECT id, last_updated FROM external_integration ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM external_integration
SELECT * FROM external_integration WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, last_updated FROM external_integration WHERE last_updated < '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, data FROM external_integration WHERE data->>'name' = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM external_integration ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, last_updated FROM external_integration WHERE data->'address'->>'city' = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM student_information_system
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM student_information_system ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM student_information_system WHERE enrollment_status = true
SELECT * FROM learning_management_system
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, start_date, end_date FROM learning_management_system ORDER BY start_date
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM student_information_system WHERE enrollment_status = TRUE;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM student_information_system ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_information_system WHERE date_of_birth > '2000-01-01';
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM learning_management_system WHERE start_date < '2022-09-01';
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor_name FROM learning_management_system WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY course_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM external_systems;
SELECT id, name FROM student_information WHERE department = 'Computer Science';
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM learning_management ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_information WHERE birthdate < '2000-01-01';
SELECT course_name, start_date FROM learning_management WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM external_systems WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, connection_url FROM external_systems WHERE name LIKE '%system%';
SELECT student_id, name, birthdate FROM student_information WHERE department = 'Computer Science' ORDER BY birthdate DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor_name FROM learning_management WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY instructor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM learning_management WHERE course_name LIKE '%database%' AND instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM courses ORDER BY credits DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM grades GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM courses WHERE credits >= 3;

SELECT students.name, courses.course_name, enrollments.enrollment_date FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT students.name, AVG(grades.grade) AS average_grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.id = grades.student_id GROUP BY students.name;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_grade >= 90;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students, courses, enrollments WHERE students.student_id = enrollments.student_id AND courses.course_id = enrollments.course_id;
SELECT teacher_name, department FROM teachers;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM teachers;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_grade > 90 ORDER BY student_name DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT student_name, student_email, course_name, grade_value FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id JOIN courses ON grades.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE grade_value >= 80 ORDER BY grade_value DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT student_name, course_name, course_description, enrollment_date FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE student_grade BETWEEN 75 AND 85 ORDER BY enrollment_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT teacher_name, course_name, course_credits FROM teachers JOIN courses ON teachers.teacher_id = courses.course_id ORDER BY course_credits DESC, teacher_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_name, count(course_id) AS num_courses FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id GROUP BY students.student_id ORDER BY num_courses DESC LIMIT 5;
